name: LocalizedString
descriptionText: LocalizedString

name: Fireball
descriptionText: Deals damage to all buildings in the affected area

name: Battle Cry
descriptionText: Increase the damage of this and the next dragon to attack

name: Chain Lightning
descriptionText: Strikes buildings with lightning that chains randomly

name: Explosive Shield
descriptionText: Absorbs damage until depleted, then explodes dealing damage to nearby buildings

name: Cloak
descriptionText: Dragon becomes invisible and cannot be targeted until it attacks

name: Cure Poison
descriptionText: Removes poison

name: Evasion
descriptionText: Dragon moves quickly over buildings and have a chance to dodge incoming projectiles

name: Vampiric Touch
descriptionText: When active gain health and rage on building destruction

name: Freeze
descriptionText: Freezes all buildings in the affected area

name: Havoc
descriptionText: Dragon deals greatly increased damage with its attacks

name: Rejuvenate
descriptionText: Restores health over time

name: Healing Mark
descriptionText: Places a mark on a building that heals the Dragon that destroys it

name: Wind Wall
descriptionText: Deflects incoming projectiles

name: Death Gaze
descriptionText: Dragon's next attack deals enough damage to destroy most buildings instantly

name: Reverse Projectiles
descriptionText: Reflects incoming projectiles back onto the attackers

name: Invincibility Shield
descriptionText: Dragon becomes invincible briefly

name: Self Destruct
descriptionText: Dragon self destructs and deals tremendous damage to every tower in the area

name: Lockdown
descriptionText: Disables a building until the next time it takes damage

name: Elemental Mayhem
descriptionText: Causes Lightning and Storm towers to go haywire and attack each other

name: Stoneskin Shield
descriptionText: Greatly reduces damage taken

name: Summon Warrior
descriptionText: Summons a spectral Warrior Dragon to fight for you

name: Archer Resist
descriptionText: Resists Archer Towers

name: Cannon Resist
descriptionText: Resists Cannon Towers

name: Storm Resist
descriptionText: Resist Storm Towers

name: Ballista Resist
descriptionText: Resist Ballista Towers

name: Trebuchet Resist
descriptionText: Resist Trebuchet Towers

name: Lightning Resist
descriptionText: Resist Lightning Towers

name: Supercharged Lightning
descriptionText: Strikes buildings with super destructive lightning that chains randomly

name: Shield of Annihilation
descriptionText: Absorbs huge damage then explodes, massively damaging buildings

name: Inner Fire
descriptionText: Become charged with competitive spirit and earn more points in this battle for the event

name: Super Heal
descriptionText: Heal your dragon multiple times!

name: Super Thunderstorm
descriptionText: Summons a cloud that brings down lighting bolts which does damage over time

name: Multi Death Gaze
descriptionText: Destroy up to 4 towers!

name: Super Freeze
descriptionText: Freezes buildings in a large area AND penetrates Red Mage Towers!

name: Thunderstorm
descriptionText: Summons a cloud that brings down lighting bolts which does damage over time

name: Intimidating Roar
descriptionText: Deals damage to buildings nearby and reduces their damage for entire fight

name: +100% XP Boost
descriptionText: Increases starting base EXP by 100% (Applied before Elite XP Bonus)

name: +200% XP Boost
descriptionText: Increases starting base EXP by 200% (Applied before Elite XP Bonus)
